attributes.action: make the No 10 petition website indpendent of political party control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Looking through the list of rejected petitions, I am concerned that several seem to be rejected simply because they disagree with publicised statements by members of the current ruling political party.

rejection.details: The site is run by civil servants and is not party political. We don't reject critical comments of the Government - our criteria for rejecting petitions is clear and well-publicised. If petitioners meet the criteria their petition will be accepted - regardless of its viewpoint on the current Government.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
